description: Water-resistant gaiters that keep you dry while cruising through bushes, mud, or snow. Ultralight helium fabric is packable and replaceable under-arch straps make repairs a cinch.Water resistant lightweight Helium fabric.Drawcord cinch provides a tight seal.Hypalon under-arch strap is replaceable for in field repairs.Reliable hook and loop closure.
name: Outdoor Research Helium Gaiters - Men's
